Maybe the most visually pleasing game I've ever played.  A bit much in terms of violence, but fun mechanics and just gorgeous production.  Story a bit overrated, but still a fun ride.  Some nice easter eggs too.  Even 5 years after it came out, I still highly recommend.

De lo mejor que e jugado en años. Lo jugue por primera vez en ps3, cada escenario y cada dialogo que se me presentaba me dejaba sin palabras. Es de esos juegos que cuando los empiezas no paras hasta que te lo terminas por c*jones. Unas vez que me consegui un pc en condiciones, no dude en pillarme esta edicion. Lo unico que critico es la batalla final, que se me hace muy flojilla. Pero por lo demas, graficos, sonido, paisajes y historia son simplemente maravillosos.
Best Bioshock in series what should I say more. Great gameplay, story, place and Elizabeth. :)

quero meu badge obg

This game is amazing. I usually don't really like to play shooter-alike games, but I loved this game from  the beginning to the end. Especially when the story unfolded, I cried :') 

I really loved the graphics, the environment and especially the characters. Even looting is fun, from small post boxes to safes and lunch baskets :3

I would recommend this game if you like rig style games with great graphics and a great story.

Mto bom, história mto boa com um leve Plot Twist de final que na minha opnião é épico realmente não esperava isso... vou jogar os anteriores tbm já que esse Bioshock foi o primeiro que joguei mas antes vou terminar a dlc (da qual eu esqueci o nome mas se passa na cidade do Bioshock 1 e 2 e interliga os mundos) mas é realmente mto bom!!

Именно после серии BioShock я узнал и навсегда полюбил стимпанк! Первая часть не отпускала ни на минуту, так как ты постоянно хотел двигаться дальше и узнать все секреты, задуманные авторами.
BioShock Infinite продолжил (имхо) гениальную серию. Это игра в которую всегда приятно вернуться и погрузиться в ее неповторимую атмосферу. Это одна из самых выгодных покупок игр, о которой не то что не жалеешь, а которой скорее даже благодарен за все, что она тебе дает.
RIP и спасибо Irrational Games за этот шедевр, после вас очень сложно воспринимать другие игры с такими же эмоциями и удовольствием!
echt een goed spel echt wel de moeite waard om tehalen

Если вы не играли в "бесконечный" биошок, то вы не уважаете себя.
Да, тут не сильно выделяющийся геймплей.
Да, тут нуднова-то, однообразные задания.
Да, это типичный шутер, который разбавляют "тоники".
Но, все это перекрывает милейшая и до жути живая Элизабет, вытянувший из себя все последние соки Unreal Engine 3 и умопомрачительный, мозгодробящий и жутко охренительный сюжет.
Все ради этого, друзья мои, да.
Вы все еще не верите? Так убедитесь в своей неправоте сами!!!

This is truly one of the best stories in video game history. The game world is unique, beautiful and dangerous. Mind blowing beginning to end
one of the best games ever made

Bioshock Infinite is one of the worst of the trilogy in terms of gameplay, altough it is the most visually stunning one. Sadly, the Big Daddy is replaced by Handyman, a boring mechanical boss that moves like a gorilla, adding nothing to the game besides annoying the player. The remaining bosses are insteresting enough tho.

The game is set in the floating city of Columbia, where a good amount of your time is looting and searching trash cans, trying to follow the classic Bioshock format. Sadly, it doesn't quite work, because Columbia IS NOT an apocalyptic city, it's modern and full of life, making no sense the need to add such mechanics to the game.

Also, where in the previous Bioshock games, the use of plasmids is pretty much necessary, or at least making the game a little easier, I can pretty much complete the entire game without using them, lacking not only an essencial part of the Bioshock formula in terms of combat, but also the need of plasmids to unlock different areas that otherwise you wouldn't have access. The only way to enter locked areas is by simply having lockpicks that Elizabeth can use in locks.

Overall, Bioshock Infinite is still a great game, despite being made for casuals.

NOTE: This game IS NOT a Bioshock game. The only times that the previous titles are mentioned is at the end of the game (last 15 minutes) and in the DLC's, where you play in Rapture.
I could have nominated this for various categories, but I went with best NPC. She toss you ammo.
Отличная игра
Amazing story, atmosphere and one my favourite games of all time

This game is very story oriented however never lacks action which has been constructed as fun, with giving enough freedom to change its pace and determine how you wish to overthrow your opponents. Apart from games success in storyline and quality, I like how the bioshock series decided to change. The isolated cities theme is similar but bioshock infinite is very different in plot and purpose. take your trip to the skies, it will be very different from under the seas.
Lo he jugado 3 veces, y aun no logro decifrarlo XD. Un excelente juego que te deja pensando, en las intrincadas lineas temporales.
The ending just makes me question so many thing.

While the gameplay is pretty generic, the story of Bioshock Infinite stands out as an instant classic that will be remembered as one of the first mainstream video games to make real commentary on society as well as delivering a story that will keep you guessing until the very last line.

If you like Quantum Mechanics and getting your god damn mind blown, this is the game for you.

(It also features beautiful graphics, an amazing story with believable characters, an actual good companion, terrific gameplay, excellent voice acting, lovely music, and you can shoot crows out of your hand.)

10/10
Uno de los mejores shooters de todos los tiempos.

Po zakończeniu gry nie mogłem się pozbierać przez kilka dni. Żadna inna produkcja nie zdruzgotała mnie tak emocjonalnie. Świetnie przedstawiona teoria równoległych wszechświatów i zdarzeń kluczowych między nimi. Intrygujące postacie, jeszcze lepsza fabuła, dobra oprawa graficzna i dźwiękowa, ale przede wszystkim świetnie kreowana postać Elisabeth, która przeżywa realne uczucia, którym często daje wyrazy mimiką twarzy i słowami, a nawet pomaga Bookerowi w walce, przez co nie jest, jak to w niektórych produkcjach bywa, przeszkodą w odkrywaniu świata, a pełnoprawną częścią fabuły, z którą aż smutno się rozstać, gdy ukończymy grę. Obok gry To The Moon i serii Mass Effect jest to jedna z niewielu gier, która była w stanie mnie poruszyć i po przejściu której przez pewien czas nie mogłem się otrząsnąć.

Polecam i tym, którzy nie grają w gry komputerowe na co dzień, a chcieliby dla próby zagrać w jeden tytuł - gra nie jest szczególnie wymagająca pod względem umiejętności, przez co może stanowić świetny wstęp do przygody w świecie gier komputerowych.
Best Game
The storyline is so great and then I LOVE Elizabeth
Однозначно шедевр! Игра должна быть в библиотеке у любого уважающего себя игрока.

By itself: a fun shooter with a multitude of ways to approach each fight.  The story is top-notch, the environments amazing, and you get attached to the other characters.

Compared to Bioshock 1&2: as much as it tries, it's still not a *real* Bioshock game.  The setting is completely changed.  The combat emphasises gunplay much more than its predecessors; while not necessarily a downside, that makes the combat style markedly different.  Many aspects of the originals are present but tweaked, including plasmids (now vigors), vending machines, audio diaries, and the "loot everything" mentality.  The end of the game and the Burial at Sea DLCs work to tie the story back to Rapture, and how well they do so is up for interpretation.  It's a good game, just not what one might be expecting coming from its predecessors.

TL;DR: good

Атмосферная игра, с интересным сюжетом, когда она вышла и появилась ломаная копия, скачал, установил, запустил (решил проверить на работоспособность) время была около 11 вечера, и не мог остановиться, после наверно 8 часов непрерывной игры я чувствовал что близится развязка, и просто уже не мог позволить себе сделать паузу на таком повороте событий, следующие 3 часа пролетели просто незаметно, пришел в себя только после того как прошел игру и кончились титры, оказалось время было уже 10 утра, сна ни в одном глазу, на глазах слезы наворачиваются, после этого я решил что соберу себе все части биошока в стиме, и купил их все на распродажах)

To put it simple: a masterpiece

Even though this game is not like the other two BioShock games I still had fun. 

The main part is the story which is interesting and somewhat mind blowing. Even though I played it more than once I still love the story.
Graphics are not that impressive however it creates a superb atmosphere together with the soundtrack.
Combat can be quite diverse but still comes repetitive after some time.

Overall it is a sweet single player game with two awesome DLCs.

Se existe um final para uma trilogia que nem este daqui me apresente, por que Irrational Games conseguiu encerrar um ciclo perfeito, com suas duas últimas DLC's mais que maravilhosas, isso não virou um jogo, mas sim uma obra de arte. E agora esperar para que no futuro um filme venha por ai, por que merecemos!
Uno de los juegos con mejor trama, ambientación y jugabilidad que he jugado en mucho tiempo. Obra maestra.

Bioshock一款讓你驚豔的FPS遊戲...
美好的未來...但人卻總是爭權奪利的墮落...再好的光明也會被黑暗腐蝕...
通過海底...來吧！來蔚藍的天空...可愛的Lizy在等你...
如果你熱愛FPS卻沒體會過一款充滿劇情的FPS...那別想了！
Bioshock是你的解藥...
